questions.question: How often do you find it difficult to experience any positive feelings at all?
How frequently do you struggle to work up the initiative to do things?
How often do you feel that you have nothing to look forward to?
How frequently do you feel down-hearted and blue?
To what extent are you unable to become enthusiastic about anything?
How often do you feel you aren’t worth much as a person?
How frequently do you feel that life is meaningless?
